Package src.graph

Class StateGraph<T>

java.lang.Object
src.graph.StateGraph<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceStateGraph<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
StateGraphLoop, StreamingStateGraph
public class StateGraph<T> extends Object implements InterfaceStateGraph<T>
Clase que representa un grafo de estado.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Larrondo y Abril Palanco
